name: zeaxanthin,NADH:oxygen oxidoreductase
definition: Antheraxanthin + 2 Reduced ferredoxin + 2 H+ + Oxygen <=> Violaxanthin + 2 Oxidized ferredoxin + H2O
comment: zeaxanthin epoxidase second step of two-step reaction (see R10070, R06946+R06947)
